mainSequence.step: Developer requests Archetype Tool to create dataset package
Archetype Tool generates dataset template and provides it to Developer
Developer defines the dataset type (Schemas, Configurations, Code)
Developer uploads the dataset package to Build System
Build System validates the package integrity and compatibility
Build System stores the validated dataset package in Dataset Repository and acknowledges storage
Build System notifies Developer about successful packaging and storage, or returns error message if validation fails
Developer deploys the dataset type for application integration
Application Ecosystem integrates the dataset type and confirms successful deployment
